name: Ultimagus
description: A magical 2D shooter/defender with unique spell selection. Blast trough 50 levels, face countless hordes of monsters and evil bosses. Become the Ultimagus!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 or later Processor: Dual-core processor (Intel Dual Core 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 5200+ 2.6 GHz) Memory: 2 GB RAM GB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows 7 full-screen mode graphic glitch
